properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 7:30PM EST until February 12 at 7:30AM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a

* Flood Warning for the Allen Creek near Boydton in...
Central Mecklenburg County in south central Virginia...

* Until 730 AM EST Wednesday.

* At 728 PM EST, reporting gauges indicate flooding along the Allen
Creek near Boydton. The current stage is 15.2 feet. Minor Flooding
is occuring. Flood Stage is 15.0 feet. At 16.5 feet Hayes Mill
Road begins to flood about 100 feet east of Allen Creek.

* Flooding will remain over mainly rural areas of central Mecklenburg
County this evening into early Wednesday morning.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the
dangers of flooding.

A Flood Warning means that flooding is imminent or occurring. All
interested parties should take necessary precautions immediately.
